item.title: How chemotherapy drug delays enzymes that support growth of cancer cells
item.description: For 40 years, etoposide has been a trusted chemotherapeutic for treating a variety of cancers. Etoposide succeeds by targeting Type IIA eukaryotic topoisomerases, enzymes - also known as topo IIs -- that enable the replication of cancer cells.

item.title: Shilpa Shetty hops on the trend with a hip mobility routine
item.description: Shilpa Shetty demonstrated a hip mobility routine and spoke of the benefits of having hip flexibility. Watch video here.

item.title: Malaika Arora starts Monday with a routine packed with Headstand and Bakasana
item.description: With a range of yoga asanas, Malaika can be seen starting her week with a fitness high. Know all about the benefits of the yoga asanas here.

item.title: Yoga for strength and stamina: 3 exercises to improve your cardiovascular, respiratory systems
item.description: Do you frequently feel out of breath while working out, performing daily duties, or engaging in any aerobic or anaerobic activity? Here are 3 Yoga exercises that increase your stamina, increase your endurance, help you persevere longer during workout and more

item.title: Cancer risk factors: Here's why Indians are at a higher risk of the disease
item.description: Health experts reveal Indian population specific risk factors that lead to a higher incidence of cancer and tips to identify and address these risk factors and reduce the disease burden from cancer

item.title: How to prepare for healthy pregnancy after miscarriage?

item.title: Pervez Musharraf dies: What is amyloidosis? Symptoms, diagnosis, treatment

item.title: Link between traffic noise and risk of tinnitus: Research
item.description: Tinnitus is most noticeable as unpleasant whistling tones in the ears, which are distressing for many people.

item.title: Age-related fat may lead to less effective muscle function: Research
item.description: Individuals with the greatest 6-year accumulation of visceral adipose tissue (VAT) in the belly had significantly lower muscle density, according to the study.

item.title: Yoga asanas to improve functioning of lungs: Malaika Arora’s trainer shares tips
item.description: “Breathing is life. By practicing these yoga asanas, improve your lung functioning and overall respiratory health. Practice more asanas like these for a better health,” wrote Sarvesh as he shared three yoga asanas.

item.title: The benefits of art therapy and how it can improve mental health
item.description: The process of creating art can be used as a means of self-expression, communication, and problem-solving, providing individuals with a unique and dynamic way to explore their inner selves. Check out its amazing benefits for mental health.

item.title: How to cook healthy meals on a budget
item.description: Cooking healthy meals on a budget can certainly present a challenge, as the cost of fresh fruits, vegetables, and lean proteins can often be higher than processed foods

item.title: Hormone therapy for cancer: How it is performed, know benefits and side effects
item.description: Hormone therapy is an effective technique to stop or slow cancer growth and is recommended to treat certain kinds of cancer like breast cancer, prostate cancer and endometrial cancer. All you want to know.

item.title: Ayurveda expert on best ways to consume fennel seeds for digestion, heart health
item.description: Fennel or saunf is a cooling spice which can work wonders for your digestion. Here are three ways to eat saunf for easing digestive issues.

item.title: 5 yoga poses for children to counteract the effects of prolonged screen time
item.description: Check out 5 yoga poses that are specifically designed to alleviate the negative effects of prolonged screen time and improve your child's physical and mental health.

item.title: What we know so far about microdosing psychedelics
item.description: Taking small quantities of psychedelics over time might improve your mood but there’s a lot we don’t understand.

item.title: The benefits of aromatherapy and including essential oils in your daily routine
item.description: Essential oils are highly concentrated plant extracts that are distilled from the leaves, flowers, roots, and other parts of a plant

item.title: How to incorporate sustainable practices into your daily life
item.description: Incorporating sustainable practices into your daily routine can help to reduce your environmental impact and promote a more sustainable way of life, whilst also improving the health and well-being of individuals and communities

item.title: 4 Indian super drinks to have every day for boosting health

item.title: World Cancer Day: 5 common reasons why women get breast cancer
item.description: Breast cancer affects millions of women globally and there are some common reasons why women get breast cancer from their family history, exposure to radiation, obesity, consumption of alcohol among others.
